attributes.action: not bestow a knighthood on Jeremy Clarkson until he has done something truly worthwhile and of benefit to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much as I love motoring and Top Gear, finding Jeremy Clarkson often very funny, rewarding Mr Clarkson with a knighthood for lauding the motor car and merely for being an entertaining celebrity would be totally inappropriate. Knighthoods and honours have already been debased by being awarded willy-nilly to entertainers and celebrities like cliff Richard and Kylie Minogue.
